name: Atlas (itch) (DepressoGames)
description:
---- STUDENT GAME FOR UNIVERSITY ----

Atlas features Linda, a young woman living in a world of grey sorrows. Venturing through tough obstacles and environments, Linda needs to face the entities that stole the colour from her world, the physical embodiment's of her emotions. 

Can she make it through the hardships that lie ahead and restore life to her world?
Can you confront the emotions that have taken over your world?

---- Controls ----

Keyboard & Mouse

WASD - Movement
Space Bar - Jump
Mouse - Menu Interaction
